p: Experiment 1. A randomly completed experiment Generalized Linear Model (GLM) procedure, with five doses for each essential oil and four replicates, was subjected to ANOVA (data means were normally distributed and presented homocedasticity). Differences ( p < 0.05) on the same day among doses (within the same essential oil), and the control, were examined by mean comparisons using the Least Significant Difference (LSD) test. The mortality data were corrected with the Abbottâ€™s formula [ 37] in the experiment described. Mean values and standard errors are given in Figure 1 (Mortality of A. obtectus on Petri dishes).
